ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Kunark: first impressions
ygData.msgSnippet: not that they aren t very nice, but the new singing steel bard armor so far has been AC only with no stats.  the boots are only AC 18, and gauntlets were found
ygData.messageBody:
not that they aren't very nice, but the new singing steel bard armor so far
has been AC only with no stats. the boots are only AC 18, and gauntlets
were found that are only AC 14, with no stats. i'm in the mood for some new
unique weapons, but i will probably keep in my full set of imbrued cause
looks always come first over stats! =) plus with the exp being so slow,
i've got enough to worry about than getting another ste of armor, ugh!

Shada Powa, L51 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> The one that I'm REALLY trying to get right now is a good
> friend (another bard) got a pair of AC18 bard
> only boots plus some stats that are the same color as the
> hero bracer out of Kunar Castle :-)
